name: Acts 1-3: The Bridge at Old Fort Crossing
description: First map narrative cutscene - crossing bridge, anomaly encounter, zombie retreat
notes: Phase 1: Static choreography only (no anomaly/zombies yet). Tests character movement on real terrain.

characters.name: Kael (Scholar)
characters.role: The Scholar - researches in library after mission

actionQueue.text: Deep ruins - north side, climb to platform

characters.name: Sera (Artist)
characters.role: The Artist - draws creatures from memory after mission

actionQueue.text: Deep exploration - center path to X=20!

characters.name: Finn (Storyteller)
characters.role: Storyteller 1 - goes to bar after mission

characters.name: Mira (Storyteller)
characters.role: Storyteller 2 - goes to bar with Finn

characters.name: Lyra (Apprentice)
characters.role: The Apprentice - helps alchemist identify substance

characters.name: Toby (Youth)
characters.role: The Youth - plays with cats after mission

notes_implementation.phase1_status: Characters defined, action queues scripted for Acts 1-3
notes_implementation.terrain_note: Uses complete-scene.json (596 voxels). Voxels loaded at runtime via __LOAD_FROM_FILE__ mechanism or manual copy.

character_personalities.Kael: Methodical scholar - straight path, careful exploration
character_personalities.Sera: Observant artist - center path, notices details
character_personalities.Finn_Mira: Social storytellers - travel together, explore together
character_personalities.Lyra: Cautious apprentice - diagonal path, hesitant, waits often
character_personalities.Toby: Energetic youth - zigzag path, playful movement

act_breakdown.act1_crossing: Characters use different paths across bridge (north/center/south), shows individual personalities
act_breakdown.act1_exploration: Fan out in ruins, explore different areas naturally
act_breakdown.act2_regroup: Multiple wait actions, characters converge back to center (anomaly moment placeholder)
act_breakdown.act3_retreat: Orderly but urgent retreat back across bridge to safety
